Verses: 1 kalagam Amarndhapinbu, Pavul Seesharaith Thannidaththirku Varavazhaiththu, Vinavikkondu, Makkedhoniyaavukkuppogap Purappattaan.
2 avan Andhath Thisaigalile Sutri Nadandhu, Seeshargalukku Veguvaaip Buththisolli, Girekku Dhesaththile Serndhaan.

3 ange Moondrumaadham Sanjariththapinbu, Avan Kappal Eri, Seeriyaadhesaththukkuppoga Manadhaayirundhabodhu, Yoodhargal Avanukkuth Theemaiseyyumpadi Ragasiyamaana Yosanaikondirundhapadiyaal, Makkedhoniyaa Dhesaththin Vazhiyaaith Thirumbippogath Theermaanam Panninaan

4 peroyaa Ooraanaagiya Sobaththarum, Thesalonikkeyaril Aristharkkum, Sekkundhum, Therbaiyaanaagiya Kaayuvum, Theemoththeyum, Aasiyaa Naattaaraagiya Theegikkum Thuroppeemum, Aasiyaanaaduvaraikkum Avanukku Vazhiththunaiyaai Vandhaargal.
5 ivargal Munnaagap Poi, Thurovaa Pattanaththile Engalukkaagak Kaaththirundhaargal.
6 pulippillaa Appappandigai Naatkalukkuppinbu Naangal Kappal Erip Pilippipattanaththai Vittu Aindhu Naalaikkulle Thurovaapattanaththukku Avargalidaththil Vandhu, Ange Ezhunaal Thangiyirundhom.
7 vaaraththin Mudhalnaalile, Appam Pitkumpadi Seeshargal Koodivandhirukkaiyil, Pavul Marunaalile Purappadavendumendrirundhu, Avargaludane Sambaashiththu, Naduraaththiri Mattum Pirasangiththaan.
8 avargal Koodiyirundha Melveettile Anega Vilakkugal Vaiththirundhadhu.

9 appozhudhu Aiththigu Ennum Perkonda Oru Vaaliban Jannalil Utkaarndhirundhu, Pavul Neduneram Pirasangam Pannikkondirukkaiyil, Migundha Thookkamadaindhu, Niththiraimayakkaththinaal Saaindhu, Moondraam Meththaiyilirundhu Keezhe Vizhundhu, Mariththavanaai Edukkappattaan.
10 udane Pavul Irangippoi, Avanmel Vizhundhu, Avanai Anaiththukkondu: Kalangaadhirungal, Ivan Uyir Ivanukkul Irukkiradhu Endraan.
11 pinbu Erippoi, Appam Pittu Pusiththu, Vidiyarkaalamalavum Veguneram Pesikkondu, Pinbu Purappattaan.
12 andha Vaalibanai Avargal Uyirullavanaagak Koottikkonduvandhu, Migundha Aarudhaladaindhaargal.

13 pavul Aasopattanam Varaikkum Karaivazhiyaaip Poga Manadhaayirundhapadiyaal, Avan Thittampanniyirundhapadiye, Naangal Kappal Eri, Andhap Pattanaththil Avanai Etrikkollumpadi Munnaaga Ange Poyirundhom.
14 avan Aasopattanaththile Engalaik Kandabodhu, Naangal Avanai Etrikkondu, Miththilene Pattanaththukku Vandhom.
15 avvidamvittu, Marunaalile Keeyutheevukku Edhiraaga Vandhu,

16 pavul Koodumaanaal Bendhekosthe Pandigainaalile Erusalemilirukkavendumendru Theevirappattadhinimiththam, Thaan Aasiyaavile Kaalampokkaadhapadikku, Ebesu Pattanaththaik Kadandhu Pogavendumendru Theermaaniththadhinaal, Marunaalile Saamutheevu Pidiththu, Thurokilliyon Oorththuraiyile Thangi, Marunaal Mileththupattanaththukku Vandhom.
17 mileththuvilirundhu Avan Ebesuvukku Aal Anuppi, Sabaiyin Moopparai Varavazhaiththaan.

18 avargal Thannidaththil Vandhu Serndhapozhudhu, Avan Avargalai Nokki: Naan Aasiyaanaattil Vandha Mudhalnaal Thodangi Ellaak Kaalangalilum Ungaludane Innavidhamaai Irundhen Enbadhai Neengal Arindhirukkireergal.
19 vegu Manaththaazhmaiyodum, Migundha Kanneerodum, Yoodharudaiya Theemaiyaana Yosanaigalaal Enakku Neritta Sodhanaigalodum, Naan Karththaraich Seviththen.
20 pirayojanamaanavaigailil Ondraiyum Naan Ungalukku Maraiththuvaikkaamal, Veliyarangamaaga Veedugaldhorum Ungalukku Pirasangiththu Ubadhesampanni,
21 dhevanidaththirku Manandhirumbuvadhaikkuriththum, Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvai Visuvaasippadhaikkuriththum, Naan Yoodharukkum Girekkarukkum Saatchiyaaga Ariviththen.
22 ippozhudhum Naan Aaviyile Kattundavanaai Erusalemukkup Pogiren; Ange Enakku Neridunkaariyangalai Naan Ariyen.
23 kattugalum Ubaththiravangalum Enakku Vaiththirukkiradhendru Parisuththa Aaviyaanavar Pattanandhorum Therivikkiradhaimaaththiram Arindhirukkiren.

24 aagilum Avaigalil Ondraiyunkuriththuk Kavalaippaden; En Piraananaiyum Naan Arumaiyaaga Ennen; En Ottaththaich Sandhoshaththode Mudikkavum, Dhevanudaiya Kirubaiyin Suviseshaththaip Pirasangampannumpadikku Naan Karththaraagiya Yesuvinidaththil Petra Oozhiyaththai Niraivetravume Virumbugiren.
25 idho, Naan Ungalukkulle Sanjariththu, Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththaik Kuriththup Pirasangampanninadhaik Kettavargalaagiya Neengalellaarum Ini En Mugaththaip Paarkkamaatteergalendru Arindhirukkiren.
26 dhevanudaiya Aalosanaiyil Ondraiyum Naan Maraiththu Vaikkaamal, Ellaavatraiyum Ungalukku Ariviththapadiyinaale,
27 ellaarudaiya Raththappazhikkum Neengi Naan Suththamaayirukkirenenbadharku Ungalai Indraiyathdhinam Saatchigalaaga Vaikkiren.

28 aagaiyaal, Ungalaikkuriththum, Dhevan Thammudaiya Suyaraththaththinaale Sambaadhiththukkonda Thamadhu Sabaiyai Meyppadharkup Parisuththa Aavi Ungalaik Kankaanigalaaga Vaiththa Mandhai Muzhuvadhaiyunkuriththum, Echcharikkaiyaayirungal.
29 naan Ponapinbu Mandhaiyaith Thappavidaadha Kodidhaana Onaaigal Ungalukkulle Varum.
30 ungalilum Silar Ezhumbi, Seeshargalaith Thangalidaththil Izhuththukkollumpadi Maarubaadaanavaigalaip Podhippaargalendru Arindhirukkiren.
31 aanapadiyaal, Naan Moondruvarushakaalamaai Iravum Pagalum Kanneerode Idaividaamal Avanavanukkup Buththisollikkonduvandhadhai Ninaiththu Vizhiththirungal.

32 ippozhudhum Sagodharare, Neengal Bakthiviruththiyadaiyavum, Parisuththamaakappatta Anaivarukkullum Ungalukkuch Sudhandharaththaik Kodukkavum Vallavaraayirukkira Dhevanukkum Avarudaiya Kirubaiyulla Vasanaththukkum Ungalai Oppukkodukkiren.
33 oruvanudaiya Velliyaiyaagilum Ponnaiyaagilum Vasthiraththaiyaagilum Naan Ichchikkavillai.
34 neengal Arindhirukkirapadi, Enakkum Ennudanekooda Irundhavargalukkum Vendiyavaigalukkaaga Indhak Kaigale Velaiseydhadhu.

35 ippadip Pirayaasappattu, Balaveenaraith Thaangavum, Vaangugiradhaippaarkkilum Kodukkiradhe Baakkiyam Endru Karththaraagiya Yesu Sonna Vaarththaigalai Ninaikkavum Vendumendru Ellaavidhaththileyum Ungalukkuk Kaanbiththen Endraan.
36 ivaigalaich Sonnapinbu, Avan Muzhangaarpadiyittu, Avargalellaarodunkooda Jebampanninaan.
37 avargalellaarum Migavum Azhudhu, En Mugaththai Neengal Inip Paarkkamaatteergalendru Avan Sonna Vaarththaiyaikkuriththu Adhigamaaith Dhukkappattu,
38 pavulin Kazhuththaik Kattikkondu, Avanai Muththanjseydhu, Kappalvaraikkum Avanudane Koodapponaargal
